description: details for a previously uploaded file

_88via.description: the mechanism via which the file was uploaded - either 'device' or the fqdn of a cloud storage platform (e.g. dropbox.com)

_88mediaType.description: keep in synch with the trait document_asStream

$eref.description: the mechanism via which the file was uploaded - either 'device' or the fqdn of a cloud storage platform (e.g. dropbox.com)

___md5.description: hash of the file's binary content

___dateUploaded.description: the date and time the file was uploaded

___preSignedUri.description: pre-signed link as per http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/API/sigv4-query-string-auth.html to access the raw data. Includes file name as the trailing component so that browsers name the download correctly.

$eref.description: keep in synch with the trait document_asStream
